lines.i: A medication a patient is currently taking

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.77"
SHALL conform to Consol Medication Activity template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd (CONF:10233)
If EHistory.12 has the value "None Reported," the value is "True" This negation of a notional class is parallel to the explicit question "patient on medication"

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor (CONF:10234)
If EHistory.12 has the value "Refused" or "Unable to Complete," the value is "NI"; the original value may be recorded in SubstanceAdministration.text. This nulled notional class is parallel to the explicit question "patient on medication"

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] doseQuantity (CONF:10230)
NEMSIS Trace: EHistory.13, EHistory.14

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] routeCode (CONF:10232), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet MedicationAdministrationRoute 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.43 DYNAMIC (CONF:10231)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedication.15

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] consumable (CONF:10235)
This consumable SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedProduct (CONF:10236)
This manufacturedProduct SHALL conform to Consol Medication Information template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.23)
This manufacturedProduct SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedMaterial (CONF:10237)
This manufacturedMaterial SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:11191), which SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.88 RxNorm) (CONF:11190)
SHALL conform to Consol Medication Activity template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="SBADM" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7496)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet MoodCodeEvnInt 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.18 STATIC 2011-04-03 (CONF:7497)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd (CONF:10233)
If EHistory.12 has the value "None Reported," the value is "True" This negation of a notional class is parallel to the explicit question "patient on medication"

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @nullFlavor (CONF:10234)
If EHistory.12 has the value "Refused" or "Unable to Complete," the value is "NI"; the original value may be recorded in SubstanceAdministration.text. This nulled notional class is parallel to the explicit question "patient on medication"
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:7500)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:7506)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:7501)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:7507)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] repeatNumber (CONF:7555)
In "INT" (intent) mood, the repeatNumber defines the number of allowed administrations. For example, a repeatNumber of "3" means that the substance can be administered up to 3 times
In "EVN" (event) mood, the repeatNumber is the number of occurrences. For example, a repeatNumber of "3" in a substance administration event means that the current administration is the 3rd in a series

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] routeCode (CONF:10232), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet MedicationAdministrationRoute 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.43 DYNAMIC (CONF:10231)
NEMSIS Trace: EMedication.15
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] approachSiteCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Body Site Value Set 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.9 STATIC 2 (CONF:7515)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] doseQuantity (CONF:10230)
NEMSIS Trace: EHistory.13, EHistory.14
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] rateQuantity (CONF:7517)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] maxDoseQuantity (CONF:7518)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] administrationUnitCode, which MAY be selected from ValueSet Medication Product Form 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.11 STATIC 1 (CONF:7519)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] performer (CONF:7522)
Contains exactly one [1..1] CDA Performer2

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:7541)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Contains exactly one [1..1] Instructions (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20)

MAY contain at least one [1..*] entryRelationship (CONF:7545)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Supply Order (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.17)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:7548)
Contains @typeCode="CAUS" CAUS
Contains exactly one [1..1] Reaction Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.9)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:7538)
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Contains exactly one [1..1] Indication (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:7554)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Dispense (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.18)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] precondition (CONF:7546)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Precondition For Substance Administration (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.25)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] participant (CONF:7523)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Drug Vehicle (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.24)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] consumable (CONF:7520)
This consumable SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedProduct, where its type is Medication Information (CONF:7521)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Medication Information (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.23)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] consumable (CONF:10235)
This consumable SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedProduct (CONF:10236)
This manufacturedProduct SHALL conform to Consol Medication Information template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.23)
This manufacturedProduct SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedMaterial (CONF:10237)
This manufacturedMaterial SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] code (CONF:11191), which SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.88 RxNorm) (CONF:11190)
Medication Activity SHOULD include doseQuantity OR rateQuantity
text, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference/@value (CONF:7502)
reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:7503)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @xsi:type = "IVL_TS" (CONF:7508, CONF:9104)
effectiveTime with @xsi:type="IVL_TS" SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] low
effectiveTime with @xsi:type="IVL_TS" SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] high
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @xsi:type = "PIVL_TS" or "EIVL_TS" (CONF:7513, CONF:9105)
effectiveTime with @xsi:type = "PIVL_TS" or "EIVL_TS" SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @operator="A" and (CONF:9106)
doseQuantity, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @unit, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet UCUM Units of Measure (case sensitive) 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.12839 DYNAMIC (CONF:7526)
participant with target entry Drug Vehicle SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="CSM" (CodeSystem: HL7ParticipationType 2.16.840.1.113883.5.90) (CONF:7524)
entryRelationship with target entry Instructions SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:7542)
Precondition for Substance Administration SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="PRCN" (CodeSystem: HL7ActRelationshipType 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002) (CONF:7550)
